name: StarСraft II: Legacy of the Void
name_original: StarСraft II: Legacy of the Void
description:
StarСraft II: Legacy of the Void is a strategy game. It came out on 10-11-2015. It was published by Blizzard Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, StarСraft II: Legacy of the Void has a score of 88. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
StarСraft II: Legacy of the Void is available on PC and macOS.
Chris Sigaty and Tim Morten produced the game. It was directed by Dustin Browder. It was scored by Jason Hayes.
